"Afin":
"Alright, this is all of it!
Mmm, partner, could you give this
to Xie for us."

"I mean, aren't you the best candidate?
You're always helping her
out the most."

"Plus, I'm pretty shy doing
this kind of thing, so I couldn't do it.
So look, can I hand it over to you?..."

"Ah, whatever, it's fine, just go.
Also, don't forget to tell her how
much everyone appreciates her!"
